text:
You know the truth now.

The missing aren't missing. They're taken.

The patterns aren't coincidence. They're design.

The town isn't haunted. It's hunting.

You gather your evidence. You prepare your report.

But when you try to leave, the roads all lead back to the center of town.

You see them watching from the windows. The ones who know.

They know that you know.

And the Tyger sees all.

You run, but you cannot hide from what is ancient.

What has always been here.

What will always be here.
